name: @open-system/asyncapi-rabbitmq
description: A template package for AsyncAPI RabbitMQ C# code generation from the Open-System repository.

asyncapiFileDir.description: Custom location of the AsyncAPI file that you provided as an input in generation. By default it is located in the root of the output directory

pdf.description: Set to `true` to get index.pdf generated next to your index.html

png.description: Set to `true` to get index.png generated next to your index.html

svg.description: Set to `true` to get index.svg generated next to your index.html

maxTextSize.description: It is possible that in case of an extremely large AsyncAPI document default mermaid recommended text size will not be enough. Then you need to explicitly make it larger

namespace.description: Name of the package, this is used as the base namespace for all classes within gen code. Useful for whitelabel as well ;)

user.description: The user to the AMQP broker

password.description: The password to the AMQP broker
